origination.label: Creator
origination.persname: Grundtvig, N. F. S. (Nicolai Frederik Severin), 1783-1872

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.p: N. F. S. Grundtvig sermon, 1862, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.p: This finding aid was derived from a MARC record using a crosswalk defined in marc2ead_sectionA.xsl. The finding aid was generated as part of a larger project to digitize several thousand small collections housed in Section A, May 2019.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Nicolai Frederik Severin Grundtvig (1783-1872), Danish author, hymn writer, pastor, and bishop of the Evangelical Lutheran Church. Based in Aasen, Denmark.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of a sermon by Grundtvig and a picture of him clipped from a newspaper.
